scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir /S /Q dist & if exist dist.zip del /Q dist.zip
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir dist\src\assets 2>nul && copy /Y src\assets\* dist\src\assets\ && mkdir dist\src\popup 2>nul && copy /Y src\popup\* dist\src\popup\
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run copy:assets && copy /Y manifest.json dist\manifest.json && pnpm run zip:dist
